amendment.description: Amendment codifies the existing Einstein 3A (E3A) program which is used to provide DHS with a situational awareness snapshot of the health of the Federal Government's cyberspace.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 114-88 to authorize the existing Einstein 3A (E3A) program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hurd (TX) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hurd (TX) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Hurd (TX).
